name: Van Dyke's Masterpiece
description:
A golf-like platformer through a comical landscape of the most famous paintings and artworks ever created. A real MASTERPIECE.

Play as salvador dali's head and complete the course as fast as you can. But remember the higher you climb the longer the way down, if you fall.

Features:

  • Golf-Mechanics
  • Artworks
  • cool text animations
  • royalty free music (you can mute it)
  • RTX-Support
  • a start menue

It's quite difficult

Enjoy
